entities.name: spinner's end
entities.description: The location where the story begins. It is described as a place with a dirty river, overgrown banks, and an immense chimney.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: A person in a position of power, mentioned as having windows where the chilly mist presses against. No further description is given.

entities.name: fox
entities.description: A scrawny fox that appears to be scavenging for food in the tall grass. It is described as having wary eyes and a tendency to freeze when it senses something strange.

entities.name: mill
entities.description: A disused mill that has an immense chimney, which is described as shadowy and ominous. No further description is given.

relationships.description: The location of the Prime Minister's windows is described as being in Spinner's End. This implies that the Prime Minister has a residence or office in this location.
The fox appears to be present in Spinner's End, scavenging for food and reacting to the appearance of the hooded figures.
The mill is described as being nearby Spinner's End, with its chimney visible in the landscape. The fox appears to be aware of the mill's presence.
The first hooded figure arrives at Spinner's End, seemingly out of thin air. This marks the beginning of a series of events in this location.
The second hooded figure arrives at Spinner's End, also seemingly out of thin air. This marks the beginning of a series of events in this location.
